identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a Neo-noir Cyber-Futuristic Command Console for Equity Trust
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech Trust with Cyberpunk Command Console
Emotion First: Every interaction feels like operating high-stakes machinery
Content is King: Data is the hero, presented with cinematic clarity
Zoom In: High-fidelity details on data points and signals
Negative Space: Deep void backgrounds to make gold/neon pop
Contrast: High-contrast text against deep dark backgrounds

rules: NO generic gradients. Use noise/grain textures.
NO center-everything. Use asymmetry and tension.
Glassmorphism must be 'Crystal' (high blur, subtle border), not 'Muddy'.
Borders must be 'Tracing Beams' or 'Holographic' (glowing, moving).

heading.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Big numbers

mono.usage: Data values, Timestamps, Signal feeds, Code snippets

grid_system.marketing: Bento Grid Mode A (Tetris) - Asymmetric, Artistic
grid_system.dashboard: Control Room Grid Mode B - Dense, Data-heavy

IconChip.description: A small, pill-shaped component combining an icon and a label, used for tags or status indicators.
IconChip.style: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-full px-3 py-1 flex items-center gap-2 text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider text-gold-500

TrustRadar.description: A circular visualization showing trust metrics. Must look like a radar sweep.
TrustRadar.implementation: Custom SVG with framer-motion rotation. Segments light up on 'scan'.
TrustRadar.style: Stroke-width: 1px, Color: Cyber Blue/Gold mix. Glow effects essential.

SignalFeed.description: A scrolling terminal-like feed of activities.
SignalFeed.implementation: Vertical list with AnimatePresence. New items slide in from top. Fade out at bottom.
SignalFeed.style: Font-mono, text-xs, green/gold status indicators. Background: Black/50 with blur.

HolographicCard.description: Standard container for features and content.
HolographicCard.style: bg-[#0B1221]/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 hover:border-gold/50 transition-all duration-500 group relative overflow-hidden
HolographicCard.effect: Add a 'scanline' div overlay with low opacity.

TracingBeam.description: A glowing line that follows the border of a container.
TracingBeam.implementation: Framer Motion layoutId or absolute positioned div animating along path.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React (already installed). Fallback to Heroicons if needed.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Configure 'Unbounded' and 'JetBrains Mono' in tailwind.config.js.
3. COMPONENTS: Build 'IconChip', 'HolographicCard', 'SignalFeed' first as reusable UI.
4. LAYOUT: Implement the Homepage sections in order (Nav -> Hero -> Signal -> Radar -> Grid -> Map -> Scenarios -> Learn -> Vault -> Footer).
5. MOTION: Apply entrance animations to ALL sections. No static scrolling.
6. MOBILE: Test every section on mobile width. Ensure no overflow.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
